title: Diet & Exercise for People with HIV / AIDS | Owen Clinic | UC San Diego Health
description: There's no such thing as a special diet for HIV+ people. But it's important that you eat well to boost your immune system. Learn more at UC San Diego Health's Owen Clinic.
cleaned_text: Diet & Exercise for People Living with HIV [](tel: 619-543-3995) Contact Us Owen Clinic: 619-543-3995 [](/insurance-billing/accepted-health-plans/open-enrollment/) Become a Patient How to switch your care to UC San Diego Health [](/for-health-care-professionals/transfers-referrals-consultations/) For Referring Physicians Transfers, referrals and consultations If you are living with HIV, it's extra important you eat well to boost your immune system. Although there is no special diet for HIV-positive individuals, your body has to work extra hard to fight off infections. This extra work consumes more energy (calories), which means you may need to eat more healthy food than you're used to.
